item.title: Dangerous low sodium needs prompt and proper medical care
item.description: I recently was contacted by the family of a middle-aged man who died from complication of hyponatremia, following care at Christus St. Elizabeth’s Hospital, in Beaumont, Texas. Hyponatremia is a dangerous condition caused when a person has a low serum sodium level. Sodium is a very important electrolyte for our bodies, with roles in maintaining blood pressure, nerve communication and fluid balance. When a person has hyponatremia, it requires urgent and correct medical attention.
